arts.ttl: 'Ultimate mould for perfect striker' - how good is Isak?
arts.sum: BBC MOTD2 pundit and former Arsenal forward Theo Walcott explains why Newcastle striker Alexander Isak's all-round game makes him a player who could get in any team.

arts.ttl: Newcastle come from behind to end Forest’s unbeaten run
arts.sum: The Magpies had defeated Forest away from home in each of the previous two seasons, but Nuno Espirito Santo's hosts, who were seeking to extend their three-match winning run, took the lead when Murillo nodded in his first career goal. Isak, who netted twice in a 2-1 win at Forest in March 2023, then turned provider for the second goal as Joelinton brilliantly beat Matz Sels, before substitute Harvey Barnes broke away to net the third.

arts.ttl: ‘Important’: Nuno says £10.6m Nottingham Forest player has 'proved' something to him after Newcastle loss
Eddie Howe pays tribute to Newcastle United's 'beast' - but now wants more
arts.sum: Newcastle United came from behind to end Nottingham Forest's run of fine form at the City Ground with a 3-1 win for the Magpies and a big win for boss Eddie Howe

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher says one Nottingham Forest player has already reached ‘cult hero’ status
Newcastle shut down Paul Merson and Nottingham Forest taunts after referee 'nonsense' - 5 things - Ciaran Kelly - Chronicle Live
arts.sum: Murillo headed Nottingham Forest in front midway through the first half, but Newcastle recovered after the break and goals from Alexander Isak, Joelinton and Harvey Barnes fired the Magpies to their first league win on the road since mid-September. Newcastle United have moved within a point of third place following an impressive 3-1 win against Nottingham Forest at the City Ground.

arts.ttl: ‘I know people say’: Paul Merson jumps to the defence of ‘intelligent’ Nottingham Forest player
Anthony Taylor's Newcastle United decisions cause anger as Jamie Carragher calls for rule change
arts.sum: Meanwhile, Livramento was forced off the pitch to seek treatment for a split open lip, as Forest got to take their own free-kick, in Newcastle's half, with a man advantage. It was a day to forget for referee Anthony Taylor as he officiated Newcastle United's 3-1 win at Nottingham Forest at the City Ground.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest fans all point the finger at one man after the Newcastle loss
Eddie Howe thinks Newcastle’s win at Forest is a ‘big moment’ for their season
arts.sum: Second-half goals from Alexander Isak, Joelinton and Harvey Barnes turned the match around.
